title: The Riot Music Team
body: I just wanted to let the ones that compose the music for League of Legends, that you guys are so amazing at creating it. I would have to say even better than John Williams, by a long shot. I'm not sure if you make all of the champion themes/ect, but to whoever does, you're amazing and have lots of talent.

replies.body:
Hey Hosue,

Thanks for your kind words - the five of us are really thrilled with all the love our players send our way.

Here's the link to a thread from a few months ago that should tell you about us: [http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/sound-music/748EyQOB-riot-music-team-update](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/sound-music/748EyQOB-riot-music-team-update)

Cheers!
You guys are amazing, I hope that one day I can be as talented in music as you all.
